item.title: Pygame:framework
item.description: 利用Pygame学习一些简单的游戏开发，参考书目《Beginning Game Development with Python and Pygame》，原书的代码是基于python2，所以笔者对代码做了一些修改，测试环境如下， 操作系统：windows 10 python版本：3.7.7 Pygame版本：1.9.6 Pygame编写游戏的基本框架， import pygame background_image_filename='sushiplate.jpg' mouse_image_filename='fugu.png' from pygame.locals import * from sys import exit #It initializes each of the submodules in the pygame package, #pygame.sound.init() will initialize the sound module pygame.init() #create a display surface screen = pygame.display.set_mode((640,480),0,32) #set the title bar of thePygame window pygame.display.set_caption("Hello,world!") backgroound = pygame.image.load(background_image_filename).convert() mouse_cursor = pygame.image.load(mouse_image_filename).convert_alpha() while True: #the close button in the Pygame window for event in pygame.
